titleStmt.title: Montelions predictions, or, The hogen mogen fortuneteller discovering as plain as a pike-staff, the dark intrigues, and grand catastrophes, carried on, or designed in most parts of the world.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, John, 1631-1706.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. and B. Griffin, for Thomas Palmer ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Phillips. Cf. NUC.
This work appears on reel 873:2 as Wing P2094, and on reel 1153:4 as Wing M2492B (M2492B cancelled in Wing CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
